data.name: SNPs
data.label: Filtering on biallelic SNPs : Number of SNPs

tool.help:
Usage ===== As input, the user provides one or more VCF files (Danecek *et al.* 2011).
For each input VCF file, the tool identifies the number of alleles for each variant and removes all loci that do not possess exactly two alleles (the reference and one alternative allele) in the output file.
Example : if a variant is monomorphic (only reference) or has more than one alternative allele, it is discarded from the output VCF file.
See also examples of VCF formats in : https://samtools.github.io/hts-specs/VCFv4.5.pdf
